Bard: Are you here to laugh at the tone-deaf bard who was
in the tavern?
No... this one.
Bard: Wow, is that an apple and bread! Can I have some?

Girl: Um... so, you know, I want you to continue the
story... please tell me.

Bard: With this, it seems like I won't go hungry. What's
your name?

Girl Mel: I'm Mel. I like stories and sometimes I go to the
tavern.
ginyushijin_ensou
ginyushijin_ensou

Bard: Oh, well then, shall I sing a special story just for
you today?

Bard: What shall I sing today? This is a long, long story
of the empire. A story of heroes.

Bard: The song of the young prince is good, as well as the
song of the brave and courageous general. The song of the
princess who was considered a poisoner is also good.

Bard: But today, I will sing a special song about a girl
named Clea and a soaring dragon!

Bard: And with this, Clea and the others' story comes to an
end.

Bard: Thank you for accompanying me with my tone-deaf
singing.
Girl Mel: Did Clea and the others lose...?
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20006

Bard: That's a difficult question. The wicked queen called
herself the queen and ruled the empire.
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20004

Bard: But that didn't last long either, as she was killed
by the dragon she created herself.
Girl Mel: What happened afterwards!?
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20001

Bard: After losing their ruler, the empire falls into a
civil war. And afterwards, instead of a king, the senate
will govern the empire.
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20003

Bard: And there, they remembered the brave prince who
fought against the wicked queen, along with Clea and the
others.
Girl Mel: So, did Clea and the others win?
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20005

Bard: Winning or losing is just a fleeting moment in the
long history.
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20001
Bard: There is something else that is truly important.
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20006

Bard: In this world, there is a poet who said that everyone
has a role given to them on the stage.

Bard: But I think, even if it seems impossible, if you
still stand up and face it...
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20002

Bard: Rather than the role given to you, you can choose the
role you desire.
Girl Mel: It's difficult and I don't understand...
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20003

Bard: Hahaha, sorry. It means that anyone can become
[someone] if they wish.
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20004

Bard: I hope you also have an interesting life. When that
time comes, I apologize for being tone-deaf, but let me sing
your song.
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20005

Bard: It's already getting dark. It's about time you should
go home.
Girl Mel: Yes, please let me hear your song again!
dobby_dispchara clear

Girl Mel: You know, it feels like you're talking about your
friends when you talk about Clea and the others!
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20004

Bard: I think they're a little different from friends, but
they were interesting people, so I had a lot to talk about

Girl Mel: You've talked to Clea before!?
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20002

Bard: I make sure to remember interesting people, so I
remember many people surrounding Clea.
Girl Mel: Please let me hear the rest someday!
Girl Mel: It's a promise!

Girl Mel: I'm home!
Mel's Father: I was worried about you until this late.

Girl Mel: I was listening to the minstrel's song! It's a
story about a protagonist named Clea, who is a dragon and a
great sword!

Mel's Father: You really love stories, don't you? Anyway,
dragons and great swords... I've never heard of that
before.
Girl Mel: Um, the setting is the Fotizona Empire!
Girl Mel: The minstrel actually met Clea!

Mel's Father: Ahahaha, you've been fooled! The Fotizona
Empire was a country that perished 500 years ago, you know?
Girl Mel: Huh...!?

Mel's Father: The only thing that remains is the old tavern
you often go to. I heard that Old Truvos was built during
the imperial era.
Mel's Father: That minstrel is just a big liar...
Mel's Father: Maybe he's lived a really long time.
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20006
Minstrel: ...Someday, I'll continue it.
dobby_dispchara clear

dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20006
Minstrel: Or perhaps, it was a role you didn't wish for?
dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20004

Minstrel: I don't know about that, but I will deliver your

dobby_dispchara skin 0 0 20006

Bard: And with this, Clea and the others' story comes to an
end.

Bard: Thank you for accompanying me with my tone-deaf
singing.
Girl Mel: Did Clea and the others lose...?

Bard: Hmm, that's a difficult question. The Mad King Lex
was feared as someone who harbored dragons.

Bard: The madness of Lex, which destroyed the Adventurers
Guild, prevented Clea and the others from directly defeating
him.

Bard: But the seeds sown by Clea and the others were not in
vain. Their actions will lead to the strengthening of the
Senate's power.

Bard: After a long civil war, the Mad King Lex was
defeated, and the empire transitioned into a republic ruled
by the Senate.
Girl Mel: So Clea and the others really lost...

Bard: When peace is achieved, people will remember the
wings of freedom that fought for them.

Bard: Clea and the others will be remembered as heroes and
eventually become legends, as the catalysts for the
establishment of a republic, and their story will be told
through songs.
Bard: You could call this a victory, right?

Girl Mel: No, that's not it! I want to hear a story where
Clea plays a major role!
Girl Mel: Hmm... I wonder what was missing...

Bard: It's been a while... to have someone listen to my
song so seriously like this...

Bard: That's right... Things can be strange, and even a
small missing piece can prevent them from going well.

Girl Mel: That's right, we just need to increase the number
of people fighting alongside us!

Girl Mel: Clea had a lot of friends she met during her
journey, right? Um, like Phoni, Opro, Armada, and Cors too!

Bard: Sometimes, even a small, insignificant word can
drastically change someone's life.

Bard: Life is a series of choices, and there may be choices
that can change history.

Girl Mel: I don't really understand about choices... but if
we did everything I just said, would Clea have been able to
win?

Bard: If miraculously all the conditions were met, Clea and
her friends' history might have changed significantly...
dobby_dispchara clear

\CL You played the role of the protagonist to the end. I
want to sing a song so bad that it's as bad as my singing.
\CL But if it's you...
